animeTitle: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 01: Action Kamen vs. Haigure Maou
animeDescription: By finding a rare Action Kamen card, Shinnosuke Nohara and his family end up being chosen to go to a parallel world and help foil an alien invasion that is occurring over there.   (Source: ANN)
